mutants.code:
def min_operations_to_equalize(A, B, C):
    numbers = sorted([A, B, C])
    if (numbers[1] - numbers[0]) % 2 != 0 or (numbers[2] - numbers[1]) % 2 != 0:
        return -1
    sum_operations = (numbers[1] - numbers[0]) // 2 + (numbers[2] - numbers[1]) // 2
    numbers[0] -= sum_operations
    numbers[1] += sum_operations
    numbers[2] -= sum_operations
    sum_operations += (numbers[1] - numbers[0]) // 2
    return sum_operations
